chunk:
All Things Jill Facial Oil, 4 Roses

Brand: All Things Jill

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Rosa canina (Rosehip) Fruit Oil, Camellia japonica (Camellia) seed oil, Prunus armeniaca (Apricot) kernal oil, Argania spinosa (Argan) oil, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Cymbopogon martini var motia (Palmarosa), Santalum album (Sandalwood), Daucus carota (Carrot Seed), Pelargonium graveolens (Geranium), Rosa damascena (Rose)
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
